attributes.action: Call for a referendum to call a general election
attributes.additional_details: Call a referendum which will decide an early election
attributes.background: The outcry from the public not being heard is at its tipping point. If the current government think they are good enough then allow the public to decide whether a general election should be held.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action: 

Introduce a mid-term referendum on whether to hold an early General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734396
